TopicTitle: WIP's - Elefant / Schwerer PanzerjÃƒÂ¤ger - T-72A - BM-13 Katyusha - Tiger Porsche

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/u1sEt3NjHNA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Damn, Porsche knew how to design a good suspension system. The Elefant can turn at 20 m/s, and the suspension absorbs the shock of ridiculously bumpy terrain at full speed without any damage, and it can brake from full speed to zero in about a second.  
  
Also, expect to see my Porsche Tiger soon. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The Elefant also has a hybrid Electric-Gas drive system.  
  
![msIrfQ1.png](http://i.imgur.com/msIrfQ1.png)  

And the T-72A is just about ready for release.

I absolutely love your t-72 and imho is the best tank youve made so far,it looks so sleek and modern ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) On the other hand, your tiger P turret is too long and looks rather large when compared to the rest of the tank. If you want you can steal my tiger turret from my tiger and il they used very similar turrets ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I absolutely love your t-72 and imho is the best tank youve made so far,it looks so sleek and modern ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) On the other hand, your tiger P turret is too long and looks rather large when compared to the rest of the tank. If you want you can steal my tiger turret from my tiger and il they used very similar turrets ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you for the offer, but your tiger turret is more akin to the Tiger-II turret with sloped armor. 

Here's my Tiger II.

![H5yUB98.png](http://i.imgur.com/H5yUB98.png)

I'm working on sorting out the new porsche tiger superstructure and building a new turret. The Tiger-I and Tiger P had non sloped turret designs, and that's how I intend on designing it.

However, I did examine it recently and your tank looks rather good, although I like my tanks for their large size. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) That way, I can run everyone over. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And I'm going to release my Porsche tiger now. The internals have been rearranged.
